snippet: Amazon says its Kindle Fire HD is “the best tablet at any price.” But there’s no GPS, no to-do list, no notes app. What’s the attraction?
abstract: David Pogue State of the Art column highlights Amazon's new touch-screen Kindle Fire HD tablet; notes it has a brighter, sharper screen and a richer sound than its rivals; points out it is missing some desirable features, but its low price is attractive.
lead_paragraph: Amazon says its Kindle Fire HD is “the best tablet at any price.” But there’s no GPS, no to-do list, no notes app. What’s the attraction?

headline.seo: More Soot Than Sparks From Amazon’s Kindle Fire HD - Review
headline.main: The Fire HD: More Soot Than Sparks
headline.print_headline: The Fire HD: More Soot Than Sparks
